properties.address: Graylingwell Chapel, Chichester, West Sussex PO19 6BZ
properties.description: Graylingwell Chapel is available to everybody from Monday to Sunday, 9am-4pm, with a café; a space to meet; a space to share and come together with friends and family. Plus a pre-school play area for young children. A flexible and welcoming community venue in the heart of the development at Graylingwell Park, Chichester!
properties.title: Graylingwell Chapel

properties.address: Sage House, , Tangmere, West Sussex PO20 2FP PO20 2FP
properties.description: Sage House is a Community Hub and Cafe providing support for people living with Dementia and their carers, our warm space and cafe is open to anyone in the local community to access, we have a pay it forward scheme and offers on food and drinks including Soup and a Roll or Tea and Toast for a £1, we also have a small foodbank available with essential items. Everyone is welcome !
properties.title: Sage House
